sentences.sContent: Good palliative care does not rely on expensive technology, but it does need staff to clean, feed and wash people.
sentences.sContent_eng: Good palliative care does not rely on expensive technology, but it does need staff to clean, feed and wash people.
sentences.sCn: 良好的缓痛护理并不需要昂贵的科技，而需要大量为病人擦洗饲喂的烦琐劳动。

synos.tran: 辩解；缓和剂；暂时姑息的手段
缓和的；掩饰的；可斟酌的

trans.tranOther: A palliative is a drug or medical treatment that relieves suffering without treating the cause of the suffering
